title: Instructional Design for Improving Interaction-Based Online Learning Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Developing capabilities to design customized online learning environments for strengthening social studies-related job competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Design three or more online learning activities that promote student-teacher, student-content, and student-student interactions
The quality of online learning environments can be analyzed using evaluation criteria for interaction types
Interaction strategies can be developed using collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Padlet) suitable for BYOD environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
